byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Carl C. Icahn disclosed that he now held a 9.8 percent stake in Navistar, a maker of trucks and buses, and had discussed adding directors to the company's board.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn disclosed that he now held a 9.8 percent stake in Navistar, a maker of trucks and buses, and had discussed adding directors to the company's board.

headline.main: Icahn Seeks to Shake Up Navistar
